Package gui

Class Summary
ImagePanel This part of the gui handles the panel that displays the images.
LockingAdapter This class handles the mouseinputs when the user wants to draw a new image lock area on the screen
LoginDialog This class handles the login dialog.
MainFrame This is the main class of the gui.
MainFrameWindowListener This class is responsible for performing a logout when the client gui window is closed.
SettingsDialog This class displays the settings dialog.
StatusBar This class draws a statusbar consisting of three fields: status, size and time
